div.div: Learning Plan for Rest of Year
div.p: Dear Families, Last night, Nebraska Governor Pete Ricketts issued a directed health measure “all schools to opera... Read More
– Mr. Todd Strom, Superintendent of Schools

This is an important message from South Sioux City High School.
As you know, all South Sioux City High School students are required to continue their learning in an online setting. This Friday, ... Read More

Beginning April 6, our Middle school will be converting to distance learning for grades 6-8. Sixth grade students needing a device are asked to come to the Middle School Monday 10am-2pm or Tuesday ... Read More

South Sioux City Community School District does not discriminate on the basis of sex, disability, race, color, religion, veteran status, national or ethnic origin, age, marital status, pregnancy, childbirth or related medical condition, or other protected status in admission or access to, or treatment of employment in its programs or activities. Positions are subject to a veterans preference.
